title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Beginner English Communication Skills via Chatbot-Assisted Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic English vocabulary and sentence structures
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Through 6 weeks of flipped learning, learners can fluently demonstrate 2 new math-related English conversation scenarios weekly
Learners can achieve ≥80% accuracy in dialogue assessments after interacting with chatbots
By project completion, learners can achieve ≥90% task completion rates using English communication skills in collaborative projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
